subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
Piracy at Sea
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: The second leg of the around-the-world Volvo Ocean Race began as the eight crews set off for Asia with the threat of piracy along the way.
snippet: The second leg of the around-the-world Volvo Ocean Race began as the eight crews set off for Asia with the threat of piracy along the way.
